N	1000	Number of nodes in the newtork
<k>	6.008	Average degree
network type	ER	Topology type of the network
D	100	Length of the opinion vector
eta	0.05	Probability of creating new message
tau	-0.8	Probability of edit an information
alpha	0.1	Probability of sending new message
order	time	Order of information: by time or by similarity
energy	-80	Energy of connections in the network
realizations	20	Number of independet realisations
time steps	1000	Number of time steps
